ValidationRule.description: This rule prevents contact centre user to change status from “Closed - Required More Information” to anything but “New”. ST contact centre user will only be allowed to change the case investigation status from “Closed - Required More Information” to “New”
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(CONTAINS( $User.Profile_Name_in_Text__c , "StarTrack Support"), ISCHANGED( Status__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c), "Closed - Required More Information"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "New")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This case investigation status change is not allowed.
